extendedInfo.description: Panasonic Blu-ray Remote 2012 brings you to the next stage of operation experience at your fingertips. Control Panasonic Blu-ray Discâ¢ Player DMP-BDT120, DMP-BDT220, DMP-BDT221, DMP-BDT320, DMP-BDT500 and DMP-BBT01 using your Android device over your Wi-Fi network. Playback a Blu-ray Discâ¢, choose your favorite language, and even select a chapter where you want to start all done by familiar Android device interface. Moreover, you can control to play music, photos or videos from your personal computers or network attached storage over DLNA, or play VIERA CAST contents from anywhere in your home. With a flick or tap of your finger(s), functions on IR remote are ready to serve.Features:- Control Panasonic Blu-ray Discâ¢ Player DMP-BDT120, DMP-BDT220, DMP-BDT221, DMP-BDT320, DMP-BDT500 and DMP-BBT01, from your Android device from anywhere in your home- Turn power on/off, call home screen, call OPTION menu functions and return- Launch VIERA Connect, Netflix and Skype directly. Enjoy playing games of VIERA Connect with game pad mode. Input search text by keyboard mode and search favorite moive on YouTube.- Play, pause, stop, fast-forward, rewind, slow, slow-back, skip, skip back, choose languages, choose subtitles, emulate jog/shuttle dial, and scrubbing- Switch picture-in-picture on/off, switch secondary audio, call display OSD menu, call status and display- Up, down, left and right by cursor, and 10 keys

reviews.title: Lovin\' it
reviews.comment: My old HTC Desire works no problems, just remember to go into the network settings menu in the player settings menu and turn on Remote Device.  I\'m thinking a few Muppets haven\'t done this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works perfectly, love the gesture feature and virtual controller. I know I\'ll misplace the controller, but I always have my phone on me, so it\'s very handy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keyboard option not optimal
reviews.comment: When using the keyboard option is selected, it is not intuitive (have to send complete word to played) or does not work with apps like Netflix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: will not connect BDP-120
reviews.comment: The app like everyone else will not see my player.  If I go into the remote device settings and change registration type to manual. Then go to remote device list and only enable the MAC address for my device the app sees the player. I can use the app fine till either the app or player turns off, then the app doesn\'t see the player anymore when I try to use again!  Hurry up and fix the bugs panasonic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t find bdt220
reviews.comment: Evo 4g  Wish it worked.  And yes, player is set to allow.  May have to do with multicast, but requiring that for a mobile app is silly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: No issues for my galaxy S3. Connected the Panasonic bdt321p to my wifi, updated the unit. Installed app on phone and now i have a phonimote. The phonimote has more functions than the stock remote fyi.
reviews.author: tim white

reviews.title: Will not work
reviews.comment: I have the 220 Blue Ray but it will not pick it up! Really disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BDT-320 and Galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Absolutely perfect, it works without any problem.  Both devices have their firmware updated at the last version, both connected via Wi-Fi.
reviews.author: Marco Scozzafava

reviews.title: Check ur settings
reviews.comment: People need to learn how to setup their router correctly if they want to use the player wired and android wirelessly. Make sure you\'re on the same subnet. Update ur firmware. Check ur remote setting on the player.
reviews.author: Luis Hurtado

reviews.comment: Simply doesn\'t work. It works fine on my wife\'s iPad and iphone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for night time use
reviews.comment: Hooked up the bdt220p , updated the firmware, set up wireless wifi. After that checked out downloaded the app onto my galaxy note 2. Worked without a problem.
reviews.author: Kliff krulik

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Good app, works. The remote interface has buttons very close together and is hard to use. Major downside is the lack of volume controls. I have all Panasonic components with Vierra connect and I can\'t control the volume? Really?
reviews.author: James Brewer

reviews.title: Last update hosed
reviews.comment: I have the BDT320 and don\'t particularly like the touch remote so the app filled in nicely. However, the last update completely messed up the on screen remote. Buttons aren\'t anywhere near their labels. Looks horrible!!! Fix this and will go back to 5 stars!
reviews.author: Kevin Bailey

reviews.title: Will not connect to BDP-220
reviews.comment: I have a Verizon Galaxy Nexus running ICS 4.0.4 - this app is simply unable to find the player. My wife\'s iPhone and ipad on the other hand work just fine! Really disappointed... Come on Panasonic, fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: what a waste !
reviews.comment: Didnot work on jellybean. Cannot dectect my player bdt 220. I \342\206\222\342\231\241 panasonic  :-X
reviews.author: sandip adhikari

reviews.title: Can\'t find bdt220
reviews.comment: Player has settings configured correctly, it\'s hooked up through wired Ethernet connection, but the app can\'t find it.  I can see the player on my network and I can ping it successfully.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deserves 0
reviews.comment: Takes me back to home screen abruptly in Vierra Connect. I hate the normal remote, but would have kept the Blu-Ray player if  the app worked right. Bd330.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Connects fine but it looks like someone spent about 5 minutes making this app and called it good.  Keyboard input also doesn\'t work in Netflix which is the only thing that might have made this worth using.  Swiping to get cursor to move works about 10% of the time.
reviews.author: Chris z

reviews.title: Works Fine
reviews.comment: I have seen most complaints on the internet but decided to buy this bluray player because of high Cnet ratings..The problem is Panasonic does not include step by step instructions.Even i had trouble at 1st!.it would say it was connected to my router and pass that test but would fail the internet connection test! All i did was unplug n reset both my modem n router after intial setup.did the test again and it worked! lastly install this app but b sure to change ur phone settings to WIFI to use this app!
reviews.author: Bernard Mitchell
